price: 144. Kullinti bagut edde ugtan ayrô fan sugak yen (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk).
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
